definitions.definition: A tentative conjecture explaining an observation , phenomenon or scientific problem and that can be tested by further observation , investigation , and/or experimentation .
An assumption taken to be true for the purpose of argument or investigation .
The antecedent of a conditional statement .

main_definition: ( sciences ) A tentative conjecture explaining an observation , phenomenon or scientific problem and that can be tested by further observation , investigation , and/or experimentation .
secondary_definitions: ( general ) An assumption taken to be true for the purpose of argument or investigation .
( grammar ) The antecedent of a conditional statement .
